typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Date as string,
		{Base Currency} as string,
		{Target Currency} as string,
		EOM_Rate as string,
		Average_Mon_Rate as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB
ConvertStringToSpecificDataType select(mapColumn(
		Date,
		{Base Currency},
		{Target Currency},
		EOM_Rate,
		Average_Mon_Rate
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: false,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: false) ~> SelectSourceColumns
LoadFromScrubbedToStagingDB derive(Date = toTimestamp(Date, 'dd/MM/yyyy'),
		EOM_Rate = toDecimal(EOM_Rate, 18, 4),
		Average_Mon_Rate = toDecimal(Average_Mon_Rate, 18, 4)) ~> ConvertStringToSpecificDataType
SelectSourceColumns sink(input(
		Forex_Date as timestamp,
		Base_Currency as string,
		Target_Curency as string,
		EOM_Rate as decimal(18,4),
		Avg_Mon_Rate as decimal(18,4)
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	truncate:true,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Forex_Date = Date,
		Base_Currency = {Base Currency},
		Target_Curency = {Target Currency},
		EOM_Rate,
		Avg_Mon_Rate = Average_Mon_Rate
	)) ~> StagingDB
